name: My Monker Ver. 0
description:
This is a Tamagatchi-like game in development and is not complete, it will take quite some time! I am using RPG Maker MV to develop the game. There is not much to do other than play rock paper & scissors as this is just a snapshot of whats to come.

There are bound to be typo's and bugs so please be patient and work with me!
